channel.title: DanielScape Quests Give Me Script, Storyline items and npcs and ill make it
channel.description:
if your a noob and had trouble on my tut on making quests link is here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,13965.msg158733.html#msg158733
if you need help adding if u do 1 thing for me
write a script a storyboard and list all npcs to be in it the items to be in it.
only talk if you have a script, storyboard and all the npcs and items to be in it also i will need your client.java to add it in.
my email is littledude149@hotmail.com
we will talk on msn and send evrything through there
thanks danie b[br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 01:44:08 AM[/size][hr]heres te quests ive made on my server so far and the hardest one i made is tormented souls

item.title: DanielScape Quests Give Me Script, Storyline items and npcs and ill make it
item.dc:creator: @masterlouah masterlouah
item.description:
@masterlouah wrote:

Hey Daniel nice guide i was looking for a guide that show me how to make quest
i got dialog.cfg and dialog.txt how can i make quest npc to talk to me
i need a tut that show me how to make npc talk to me and give me quest and got reward just like Rs
but the link that u post it tell me to find /QUEST VOIDS AND INTS/ in client.java cant find it i think i dotn have that oh btw iam using project16 v1.3
can i give u my client java?
my server still have all same quest like Rs can you try to get me all quest npc to talk and some quest work? if you can then tell me i psot the download link here

Read full topic
